documentation.author: Jane Perez
documentation.purpose:
exclude ethyl chloride topical spray and benzocaine 20% topical spray from plans if patient < 4yo
**Note: Rule has to be in Testing status in order for it to work.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_POWERPLAN_E
templateDefinitions.definition: Selected Power Plan is listed in POWER_PLAN

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_POWERPLAN_FLEX_ORDERS_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Flex PowerPlan COMPONENT_TYPE orders ORDERS by ACTION SCOPE and add OPT_NOTATION_TYPE stating OPT_NOTATION

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only
Admission Bronchiolitis Peds v2 EKM
Admission Asthma Peds v2 EKM
Admission Peds v2 EKM
Admission PICU v2 EKM
Anes Peds Multiphase v2 EKM
Bronch Preprocedure EKM
Cardiac Cath Peds Multiphase v2 EKM
Electrophysiology Peds Multiphase EKM
Pre Cardiac Cath Peds EKM
Preop Anes Peds EKM
Post Electrophysiology Peds EKM
Encounter Type
is listed
Encounter Status
is not listed

Admission Peds v2 EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old if Emla not ordered, refused, or wait time not permitting.

Admission Peds v2 EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>2 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: to back of throat prior to NG tube insertion for children greater than 4 years old

Admission Asthma Peds v2 EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old

Admission Asthma Peds v2 EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>2 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: to back of throat prior to NG tube insertion for children greater than 4 years old

Admission Bronchiolitis Peds v2 EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>2 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: to back of throat prior to NG tube insertion for children greater than 4 years old

Admission Bronchiolitis Peds v2 EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old if EMLA not ordered, refused, or wait time not permitted.

Admission PICU v2 EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: Use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old

Admission PICU v2 EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>1 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: 2 sprays to back of throat prior to NG tube insertion for children greater than 4 years old.
Bronch Preprocedure EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, PreBRONCH, Clinical Instructions: 30 minutes prior to bronchoscopy.

Post Electrophysiology Peds EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: Use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old

Pre Cardiac Cath Peds EKM==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old if Emla not ordered, refused, or wait time not permitting.

Preop Anes Peds EKM==>benzocaine 20% Topical Spray==>1 app, TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: 2 sprays to back of throat prior to NG tube insertion for children greater than 4 years old

Pre Cath==>Ethyl Chloride topical spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old if Emla not ordered, refused, or wait time not permitting.

Admission PICU v2 EKM==>Pain Ease Mist Topical Spray==>1 spray(s), TOP, Spray, as directed, PRN Other: SEE COMMENT, Clinical Instructions: use prior to venipuncture for children greater than 4 years old if Emla not ordered, refused, or wait time not permitting.

Removing Order
in all phases and subphases in the Plan
